com.aionemu.commons.scripting.impl.javacompiler
Class ScriptClassLoaderImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              com.aionemu.commons.scripting.ScriptClassLoader
                  com.aionemu.commons.scripting.impl.javacompiler.ScriptClassLoaderImpl

public class ScriptClassLoaderImpl
extends ScriptClassLoader

This classloader is used to load script classes.

Due to JavaCompiler limitations we have to keep list of available classes here.

Author:
SoulKeeper

getRawClassByName

protected byte[] getRawClassByName(java.lang.String name)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Finds class with the specified name from the URL search path. Any URLs referring to JAR files are loaded and opened as needed until the class is found.

Parameters:
name - the name of the class
Returns:
the resulting class data
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the class could not be found
